meta.title: Shenzhen Shenye Jinzhan Materials Supply Co., Ltd. - Industry Solutions
meta.description: One-Stop Supply Chain Solutions for Research Procurement

education.title: University Equipment Supply Chain Solutions
education.description: Addressing university needs for laboratory construction and teaching equipment updates, we provide full-cycle services covering 'equipment procurement - import customs clearance - tax planning - logistics distribution', solving issues such as long equipment introduction cycles and difficult policy control.

services.title: Core Services
services.service1Text: Providing procurement order execution and import/export permit agency services, with annual equipment import value exceeding 3 billion+, ensuring rapid introduction of cutting-edge equipment.
services.service2Text: Customizing duty-free schemes for universities, handling duty-free entity qualification and procedures, achieving 95%+ equipment classification accuracy, saving over 30 million in taxes for university customers.
services.service3Text: Providing Shenzhen-Hong Kong and domestic transportation, warehousing and distribution services. Equipped with professional transportation teams for precision instruments, achieving precise 'door-to-laboratory' equipment delivery with 95% on-time rate.
services.item1: Equipment Procurement and Import Agency: Providing procurement order execution and import/export permit agency services, with annual equipment import value exceeding 3 billion+, ensuring rapid introduction of cutting-edge equipment.
services.item2: Specialized Tax Planning: Customizing duty-free schemes for universities, handling duty-free entity qualification and procedures, achieving 95%+ equipment classification accuracy, saving over 30 million in taxes for university customers.
services.item3: Logistics Distribution: Providing Shenzhen-Hong Kong and domestic transportation, warehousing and distribution services. Equipped with professional transportation teams for precision instruments, achieving precise 'door-to-laboratory' equipment delivery with 95% on-time rate.

case.title: Success Case
case.content: Imported quantum computing experimental equipment worth 50 million for a key university in Shenzhen, saving over 6 million in taxes through professional tax planning. 100% success on first application, only 45 days from order confirmation to equipment arrival, significantly shortening the project preparation cycle.

medical.title: Hospital Medical Equipment Full-Chain Solutions
medical.description: Addressing the strict requirements of top-tier hospitals for high-end medical equipment introduction and consumable supply chain management, we provide customized services focusing on 'compliance and efficiency - cost optimization - logistics assurance', helping hospitals improve diagnostic and treatment service capabilities.

services.title: Core Services
services.service1Text: Familiar with medical equipment import regulations, handling import permits, customs declaration and inspection procedures. 80%+ first-time success rate, 30% reduction in average clearance time, ensuring rapid clinical deployment.
services.service2Text: Providing Shenzhen-Hong Kong warehousing, bulk packing and distribution services, establishing dynamic inventory monitoring systems for consumables, achieving 'on-demand distribution, zero-inventory management', reducing hospital warehousing costs by 20%+.
services.service3Text: Assisting hospitals in participating in medical equipment bidding projects, providing policy and regulation consulting and bid document review services, improving project success rate by 40%+.
services.item1: Medical Equipment Import Clearance: Familiar with medical equipment import regulations, handling import permits, customs declaration and inspection procedures. 80%+ first-time success rate, 30% reduction in average clearance time, ensuring rapid clinical deployment.
services.item2: Consumable Supply Chain Management: Providing Shenzhen-Hong Kong warehousing, bulk packing and distribution services, establishing dynamic inventory monitoring systems for consumables, achieving 'on-demand distribution, zero-inventory management', reducing hospital warehousing costs by 20%+.
services.item3: Bidding and Policy Consulting: Assisting hospitals in participating in medical equipment bidding projects, providing policy and regulation consulting and bid document review services, improving project success rate by 40%+.

case.title: Success Case
case.content: Imported proton therapy equipment worth 80 million for a top-tier hospital in Shenzhen, handling full import permits and duty-free procedures, saving over 9 million in taxes. Through customized logistics solutions, achieved safe equipment delivery and installation, 15 days ahead of schedule.

research.title: Research Institute Specialized Equipment Solutions
research.description: Focusing on major scientific research project needs of research institutes, we provide integrated 'policy adaptation - financial support - compliance supervision' services, helping research equipment arrive quickly and be used compliantly, ensuring smooth project progress.

services.title: Core Services
services.service1Text: Real-time tracking of national and local research equipment import policies, assisting with project filing and duty-free applications. Accounting for 60%+ of research equipment duty-free filings in Shenzhen.
services.service2Text: Providing procurement fund advance and letter of credit financing services, with bank credit limit of 500 million+, alleviating research project funding pressure. Has provided over 200 million in funding support to 15 research institutes.
services.service3Text: Providing off-site and mobile supervision services for duty-free equipment, ensuring compliant use. Also providing equipment insurance and claims agency services, with 90% risk coverage rate.
services.item1: Policy Research and Project Filing: Real-time tracking of national and local research equipment import policies, assisting with project filing and duty-free applications. Accounting for 60%+ of research equipment duty-free filings in Shenzhen.
services.item2: Supply Chain Financing Support: Providing procurement fund advance and letter of credit financing services, with bank credit limit of 500 million+, alleviating research project funding pressure. Has provided over 200 million in funding support to 15 research institutes.
services.item3: Equipment Supervision and Value-Added Services: Providing off-site and mobile supervision services for duty-free equipment, ensuring compliant use. Also providing equipment insurance and claims agency services, with 90% risk coverage rate.

case.title: Success Case
case.content: Completed a 200 million aerospace testing equipment import project for a national research institute, advancing 120 million in procurement funds through supply chain financing. 95%+ duty-free classification success rate, assisted with off-site use supervision filing, ensuring on-time project launch.
